## Overview

Taking care of input and output of event data is done easily by way of the xesreadR package. XES refers to [eXtensibe Event Stream notation](http://www.xes-standard.org/), and is a IEEE standard for storing and sharing event data.An overview on the functions is shown below. 

```{r include = F}
library(pander)
```
